About this Documentation

 
 
 

This Documentation contains everything you need to know to get started with the Beast SDK, to integrate it with your game, and to take full advantage of its most advanced features.

Formats

This guide is available in the following formats:

  • In an HTML format suitable for viewing on any platform, with navigation through hyperlinks, a table of contents and full-text search. Requires a Web browser that supports JavaScript, framesets, cookies and cascading style sheets.
  • In a PDF format suitable for printing or viewing on any platform. Requires the Acrobat Reader application, available for free from http://www.adobe.com. Note: the API Reference section of the documentation, which contains detailed information on the data structures and functions of the Beast API, is currently unavailable in this format. This format is available on-demand from Autodesk Support. See Support.

Topics in this section
